attributes.action: resign gracefully before the next election and allow history to be the judge, not the future...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Based on both tenure and record, it is time to step away and let the people vote on the principals and characters that will orchestrate the next 10 years of government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
